titles: A reply to a paper intituled: An answer to the pretended case printed concerning the navigation of the river Wye, in the county of Surrey, by shewing the true state thereof
author: Pitson, James.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
